data.name: I'm Still Here (Cozy Pitch)
data.detailed_description:
ONE OF FOUR GAMES IN COZY PITCH PACK

I'm Still Here is one of four short games in the Cozy Pitch Pack. Each game is a polished idea that we know can turn into something much bigger. Vote for your favorite using the in-game menus and the winner gets expanded in a sequel. Cast your vote and make your voice heard!

FEATURES


You've just moved into your new apartment but something spooky is going on! Thankfully you've got the internet to help you. Search Wahoo Answers on your laptop to figure out what's going on and maybe you can be happy in your new place.


EXPLORE YOUR NEW APARTMENT: Unpack and get settled into your new place. But be careful because you may not be alone. (Who are we kidding, you definitely aren’t alone. Watch your back)


SEARCH WAHOO ANSWERS: As inexplicable events start happening in your apartment, you’re going to need answers. Thankfully, you’ve got the friendliness of internet strangers to count on.

ISN’T THIS A FREE GAME?

Yes! Kind of. There is a free beta available online and we've decided to leave it there. This Cozy Pitch Pack version has some small additions, improvements, and bug fixes. Most importantly, this is your way of showing us you want a sequel. If you like this game and want to show your support, here is your chance.

COZY GAME PALS:

We are a duo of experienced creatives. Bryan is the coder, he has worked on Journey, The Last of Us, and Uncharted 4. Crista is the is the artist, she has worked at Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon, FOX, and Warner Bros. We are working together as Cozy Game Pals to add variety to the types of games you can play.

data.short_description: You've just moved into your new apartment but something spooky is going on! Thankfully you've got the internet to help you. Search Wahoo Answers on your laptop to figure out what's going on and maybe you can be happy in your new place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
